Uses of Package
org.siframework.abbi.atom

Packages that use org.siframework.abbi.atom
org.siframework.abbi.api This package contains classes used to define the API implemented by an ABBI Back-End. 
org.siframework.abbi.api.xds This package represents an implementation of an ABBI Back End supporting connection to an XDS Registry using the Open Health Tools IHE Profiles library to connect to the Registry and Repository To configure this package, you must specify the location of the registry, repositories, and registry patient ID OID in the search.api.mapping.properties file found in the WEB-INF folder. 
org.siframework.abbi.atom This package defines an interface to an Atom feed, and provides utilities to convert an Atom feed to and from XML, and to (and eventually from) JSON formats. 
org.siframework.abbi.atom.impl This package provides simple Java Beans that implement the Atom Interfaces specified by the org.siframework.abbi.atom package. 
org.siframework.abbi.servlet This package contains the Servlet for the ABBI Front End. 
 

Classes in org.siframework.abbi.atom used by org.siframework.abbi.api

          Implements the interface to a Entry in an Atom Feed

          Implements the interface to a Category in an Atom Feed HL7 V3 and XDS use four parts to describe a coded element, including a code (term), display name (label), code system OID (scheme) and code system name (text).
